entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 5:42 PM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:42 PM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
